attributes.action: A call for police to regularly patrol the lower High Street of Lincoln
attributes.additional_details:
Two young men were stabbed in the lower High Street area of Lincoln on December the 12th - this is just one recent report.

It is time for Lincoln to begin or increase its patrols around the lower High Street area in order to have a safer city.

Lives are at risk.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for Lincoln police.
